name: MEC Downpour Lumix High Visibility Waterproof Cycling Jacket - Women's
description:
Year-round bike commuters tend to be a practical bunch, prioritizing safety, comfort and reliability above all else. To these hardy souls, MEC presents this fully waterproof, high visibility cycling jacket. It's ruggedly built and tailored for fit and coverage in the riding position. The omni-directional reflective details show up brilliantly in the gloom of winter.Nylon outer fabric has a waterproof-breathable non-porous hydrophilic laminate.DWR treated and fully seam taped for reliable waterproofness.Collar is scooped at rear for optimal fit in the riding position.Microfleece collar lining is comfortable against your skin.Chinguard/windflap is integrated into collar.Zipper vents allow you to vent extra heat, with twin pulls for a range of vent opening options.Elongated arms and drop hem in back ensure adequate coverage while riding.Internal chest pocket.Spacious rear flap pocket has a glued zipper for secure, waterproof storage.Drawcord hem helps you seal out the elements.Adjustable hook and loop straps on cuffs.Heat transfer reflective detailing ensures exceptional visibility from all angles.

Regular fit



Fit guide

Technical garments, designed for specific activities have features that aren’t always adaptable to general use. For example, cycling clothing is longer in the back and arms. Activity aside, the fit of MEC clothing falls into these categories:





Our next to skin fit that contours the body for no distractions





Our close to body fit with a low profile silhouette for ease of movement





Our standard, slightly off body fit for unrestricted comfort





Our roomy, off body fit for maximum comfort and easy layering




        Sustainability
